Html:
Hi, is it possible to set an image like a watermark (print-view) or is it possible to set a background-Image (for printing) ??

Thank you fpr help,
Stephan

Okay, I know this example before. Since this morning, I didn't know that you can use the HEADER for a watermark picture. After your post, I searched in google and found a good tutorial for setup an picture as a watermark on every page. But I'm not sure, if it is 100% possible with phpexcel. In this example they work with a "washout".

http://www.howtogeek.com/151327/how-to-add-a-watermark-to-a-worksheet-in-microsoft-excel-2013/

Watermark is not possible in excel - you can fix it with an image in the header

http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/excel-help/mimic-a-watermark-in-excel-HP001213802.aspx

I will try :)
If you want it as a full watermark, rather than as a header image, then the answer is simply that it's not possible
